result.markdown:
--- title: "Task Force Questions" author: "Theresa Szczepanski" date: "2022-12-12" format: html: df-print: paged toc: true code-fold: true code-copy: true code-tools: true categories: - BPS Redistricting #image: "image.jpg" --- ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} library(tidyverse) library(ggplot2) library(lubridate) library(readxl) library(hrbrthemes) library(viridis) library(ggpubr) library(purrr) library(plotly) knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE) ``` ::: # Read in Enrollment by Selected Populations ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} BPS_Selected_Pops_Current <- read_excel("data_BPS/Selected Populations Reports (School).xlsx",sheet = "2022-2023", skip = 1)%>% select(`School Name`, `First Language Not English #`, `First Language Not English %`, `English Language Learner #`,`English Language Learner %`, `Students With Disabilities #`, `Students With Disabilities %`, contains("#...16"), contains("Low"))%>% filter(str_detect(`School Name`,"Braintree"))%>% filter(!str_detect(`School Name`, "Braintree High"))%>% filter(!str_detect(`School Name`, "Middle"))%>% filter(!str_detect(`School Name`, "Quab"))%>% filter(!str_detect(`School Name`, "Monat"))%>% mutate(`High Needs %` = `High Needs #...16`)%>% select(!contains("...16")&(contains("%")|contains("School Name"))) BPS_Selected_Pops_Current ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
````` ::: ::: # Read in Current Elementary (1-4) Enrollment by Grade ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} BPS_Elementary_Enrollment_by_Grade_Current <- read_excel("data_BPS/Enrollment by Grade (School).xlsx",sheet = "2022-2023", skip = 1)%>% select(`School Name`, `1.0`,`2.0`, `3.0`, `4.0`)%>% filter(str_detect(`School Name`,"Braintree"))%>% filter(!str_detect(`School Name`, "Braintree High"))%>% pivot_longer(c(2:5), names_to ="Grade Level", values_to = "Enrollment Grade Level")%>% filter(!str_detect(`School Name`, "Middle"))%>% filter(!str_detect(`School Name`, "Quab"))%>% filter(!str_detect(`School Name`, "Monat"))%>% mutate(`Current MS` = case_when( !str_detect(`School Name`, "Liberty|Highlands") ~ "East", str_detect(`School Name`, "Liberty|Highlands") ~ "South"))%>% mutate(`Proposed MS` = case_when( !str_detect(`School Name`, "Liberty|Highlands|Flaherty") ~ "East", str_detect(`School Name`, "Liberty|Highlands|Flaherty") ~ "South"))%>% mutate(`Proposed MS2` = case_when( !str_detect(`School Name`, "Liberty|Highlands|Morrison") ~ "East", str_detect(`School Name`, "Liberty|Highlands|Morrison") ~ "South")) BPS_Elementary_Enrollment_by_Grade_Current ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
````` ::: :::
